name: Remove Cookie Consent
description: This style will remove most of those "I accept that our website is using cookies" boxes.
css: div[id^="cookie"], div[id*="cookie"],div[id^="Cookie"], div[id*="Cookie"],div[id^="privacy"], div[id*="privacy"],div[id^="Privacy"], div[id*="Privacy"],div[id^="consent"], div[id*="consent"],div[id^="Consent"], div[id*="Consent"]{display:none !important}
